title: Clips
description: A dynamic Angular web app for seamless video uploading, organization, and playback. Clips features robust forms, real-time video management, responsive design, efficient state management, and Firebase integration, delivering a smooth and user-friendly experience across devices.

title: Vidly
description: A React-based movie rental application showcasing CRUD operations, state management, and routing. Vidly features dynamic UI updates, reusable components, and backend integration to manage movie listings and rentals effectively. Built with a focus on clean design and scalable architecture.

title: Beatmaker
description: An interactive JavaScript-based beat-maker weapp featuring customizable sounds like kick, snare, and hi-hat. Includes functionality to adjust tempo and speed, toggling sound playback and providing a dynamic and engaging music creation experience.

title: Photon
description: Photon is a JavaScript image viewer using Pixels API. It features infinite scrolling, a modern UI, optimized performance, and a download option for effortless browsing and saving of stunning images.

title: Snake Game
description: A classic Snake Game built with Java Swing and AWT, featuring all the traditional gameplay mechanics. This project is compatible across all operating systems, delivering a nostalgic and seamless gaming experience.

title: To Do List
description: A JavaScript-based to-do list application with features to add, delete, filter, and mark tasks as done, offering a simple yet effective task management solution. The app focuses on user-friendly interactions and seamless functionality.
